attributes.action: Pay Bob McGowan of Portsmouth the Fuel Allowance that he is entitled to!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Pay Bob McGowan the Fuel Allowance that he is entitled to & furthermore pay compensation to this admirable & brave war hero for this ridiculous situation - It's an absolute disgrace!

rejection.details: Please contact the DWP directly or make your petition more general in nature. We can not accept petitions about individual circumstances.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
